thread.title: Wanted: A Brewery for DIA's New Hotel
thread.title_full: Wanted: A Brewery for DIA's New Hotel | Westword

author: Michael Roberts
title: Wanted: A Brewery for DIA's New Hotel
text:
Denver International Airport Facebook page Denver blog posts could use a little pick-me-up.
Related Stories Ten Great Colorado Ways for Families to Celebrate October and Halloween At our Food & Drink blog, Jonathan Shikes has the lowdown on DIA seeking a brewery for the new Westin airport hotel .
Denver Egotist highlights the new Swift open-source radio-station app by Denver's Matthew Fecher .
Mile High Hockey's Ryan Murphy has the sad task of describing how the Minnesota Wild's Zach Parise scored a hat trick on Colorado Avs ice .
Contact: Michael Roberts Follow: Michael Roberts Westword Westword
